chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
v: Vector.t nat n
p: pos n

Goal:
v[(S (v#>p))/p] = vec_plus (vec_one p) v

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
vec_one = fun (n : nat) (p : pos n) => vec_set_pos (fun q : pos n => if pos_eq_dec p q then 1 else 0) : forall n : nat, pos n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_one {n}%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
vec_plus = fun (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n) => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => (v#>p) + (w#>p)) : forall n : nat, vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_plus {n}%nat_scope
vec_plus_comm : forall (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n), vec_plus v w = vec_plus w v
vec_plus_assoc : forall (n : nat) (u v w : vec nat n), vec_plus u (vec_plus v w) = vec_plus (vec_plus u v) w
vec_plus_cons : forall (n x : nat) (v : vec nat n) (y : nat) (w : vec nat n), vec_plus (x ## v) (y ## w) = x + y ## vec_plus v w
vec_zero_plus : forall (n : nat) (v : vec nat n), vec_plus vec_zero v = v
vec_plus_is_zero : forall (n : nat) (u v : vec nat n), vec_zero = vec_plus u v -> u = vec_zero /\ v = vec_zero
vec_pos_plus : forall (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n) (p : pos n), vec_plus v w#>p = (v#>p) + (w#>p)
pos2nat_nxt : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat (pos_nxt p) = S (pos2nat p)
pm_lift_nxt : forall (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n) (p : pos m), pm_lift r (pos_nxt p) = pos_nxt (r p)
vec_one_nxt : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), vec_one (pos_nxt p) = 0 ## vec_one p
pos2nat_left : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat (pos_left m p) = pos2nat p
pos_both_left : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n), pos_both n m (pos_left m p) = inl p
pos_both_right : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos m), pos_both n m (pos_right n p) = inr p
pos_lr_both : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos (n + m)), pos_lr (pos_both n m p) = p
pos2nat_right : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos m), pos2nat (pos_right n p) = n + pos2nat p
VectorSpec.replace_id : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (p : pos n) (v : vec A n), VectorDef.replace v p (VectorDef.nth v p) = v
pos_map = fun m n : nat => pos m -> pos n : nat -> nat -> Set Arguments pos_map (_ _)%nat_scope
VectorDef.rev_append_tail = fix rev_append_tail (A : Type) (n p : nat) (v : vec A n) (w : vec A p) {struct v} : vec A (tail_plus n p) := match v in (vec _ n0) return (vec A (tail_plus n0 p)) with | vec_nil => w | VectorDef.cons _ a n0 v' => rev_append_tail A n0 (S p) v' (a ## w) end : forall (A : Type) (n p : nat), vec A n -> vec A p -> vec A (tail_plus n p) Arguments VectorDef.rev_append_tail {A}%type_scope {n p}%nat_scope
gt = fun n m : nat => m < n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gt (_ _)%nat_scope
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v0 w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type]
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pred _%nat_scope
VectorDef.append = fix append (A : Type) (n p : nat) (v : vec A n) (w : vec A p) {struct v} : vec A (n + p) := match v in (vec _ n0) return (vec A (n0 + p)) with | vec_nil => w | VectorDef.cons _ a n0 v' => a ## append A n0 p v' w end : forall (A : Type) (n p : nat), vec A n -> vec A p -> vec A (n + p) Arguments VectorDef.append {A}%type_scope {n p}%nat_scope
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v0) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type]
vec_zero = fun n : nat => vec_set_pos (fun _ : pos n => 0) : forall n : nat, vec nat n Arguments vec_zero {n}%nat_scope
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat]
VectorEq.cast : vec ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> vec ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- Type] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n p : pos n |- nat]
